message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe would be of great value to you.  I'm starting with an offer price of $12,000. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $10,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $11,000, which still leaves some room for both of us. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've decided to stick to my original budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product.
